attributes.action: Call for the BBC to sack Jeremy Clarkson
attributes.additional_details: This is to stop Jeremy Clarkson using the BBC as a platform for his hatred. His outbursts should get him sacked sign if you agree.

rejection.details:
This is a matter for the BBC.

It is a long-standing principle that the Government does not interfere in programme matters. It is important to maintain the principle of freedom of expression which political interference could undermine.
